Summary: Looked like red "twinkling star" but not a star (moved). Got binoculars and saw multicolored LEDish lights flashing randomly.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Ball Ground
There were no other sightings in Ball Ground on or around April 15th 2012
divs: sighting detailsi heard a thumping noise on the roof (?), and went to ask if my housemate had heard it. he had, so i stepped out onto the porch to listen, and in the distance i saw a very bizarre light in the sky. (no, i haven't been drinking. nor am i on intoxicants of any kind, and i have a fellow witness!) with the naked eye it looked like just a pulsing light hovering above the treeline, making a few sharp darting movements. through binoculars (nikon 8x40 8.2) it was a ball\cluster of strobing led looking red, amber, green (at least 15-20 individual lights, all flashing in no sequence or order). it moved left. went below treeline for a moment, came up, moved right, went below treeline again, came back up farther to the right, moved a bit back left, went down below treeline and was gone. it was west of my location, i'm guessing near lake allatoona\cartersville. observed it from around 11:24 to 11:33...
